languages.text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.
languages.original_text: Ассасин получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} против врагов, которые {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} или страдают от {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}кровопотери{/g}. Прибавка складывается из бонусов за каждый из этих {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g}, но в сумме не может превышать 45.

traits.locale_text: The Assassin gains +15 lethality against enemies that have any of following effects: slowed, immobilised, or haemorrhage. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

The Assassin gains +15 lethality against enemies that have any of following effects: slowed, immobilised, or haemorrhage. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or haemorrhage. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or haemorrhage. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

Прибавка складывается из бонусов за каждый из этих {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g}, но в сумме не может превышать 45.
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: Ассасин получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} против врагов, которые {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} или страдают от {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}кровопотери{/g}. Прибавка складывается из бонусов за каждый из этих {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g}, но в сумме не может превышать 45.

Ассасин получает +15 к летальности против врагов, которые замедлены, обездвижены или страдают от кровопотери. Прибавка складывается из бонусов за каждый из этих эффектов, но в сумме не может превышать 45.

languages.text: 当刺客攻击{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}或{g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}放血{/g}的敌人时，此次攻击额外获得+15{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}。每种{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}都会提供致命加值，但最高只能提供+45致命。
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客攻击减速、定身或放血的敌人时，此次攻击额外获得+15致命。每种效果都会提供{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}致命{/g}加值，但最高只能提供+45致命。

当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}或放血的敌人时，此次攻击额外获得+15{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}。每种效果都会提供致命{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，但最高只能提供+45致命。

languages.text: El asesino gana +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} contra enemigos que tengan cualquiera de los siguientes {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} o {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}hemorragia{/g}. Esta bonificación se recibe una vez por cada uno de esos efectos, pero no puede exceder un +45 de letalidad.
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: El asesino gana +15 de letalidad contra enemigos que tengan cualquiera de los siguientes efectos: ralentizado, inmovilizado o hemorragia. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se recibe una vez por cada uno de esos efectos, pero no puede exceder un +45 de letalidad.

languages.text: Der Assassine erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} gegen Gegner, die einen der folgenden {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekte{/g} aufweisen: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} oder {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}Blutung{/g}. Der Bonus wird für jeden dieser Effekte gewährt, kann aber +45 Letalität nicht überschreiten.
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: Der Assassine erhält +15 Lethalität gegen Gegner, die einen der folgenden Effekte aufweisen: verlangsamt, bewegungsunfähig oder Blutung. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird für jeden dieser Effekte gewährt, kann aber +45 Lethalität nicht überschreiten.

languages.text: L'assassin bénéficie de +15 points de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} contre les ennemis qui subissent l'un des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} suivants : {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} ou {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}Hémorragie{/g}. Le bonus s'applique à chacun de ces effets, mais ne peut dépasser +45 points de létalité.
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: L'Assassin bénéficie de +15 points de létalité contre les ennemis qui subissent l'un des effets suivants : Ralentissement, Immobilisation ou Hémorragie. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} s'applique à chacun de ces effets mais ne peut excéder +45 points de létalité.

languages.text: アサシンは、「{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}」「{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}」「出血」の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が付与されている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を+15獲得する。ボーナスはそれぞれの効果ごとに得られるが、+45を超えることはない。
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or haemorrhage. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.

traits.locale_text: アサシンは、「{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}」「{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}」「出血」の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が付与されている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を+15獲得する。ボーナスはそれぞれの効果ごとに得られるが、+45を超えることはない。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}「減速」{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}「移動不可」{/g}「出血」の効果が付与されている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}が+15される。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はそれぞれの効果ごとに得られるが、+45を超えることはない。

languages.text: Suikastçı; {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} veya {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}nezif{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisi{/g} altındaki düşmanlara karşı +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} kazanır. Bonus, her etki için ayrı ayrı hesaplanır ancak toplam +45 öldürücülüğü aşamaz.
languages.original_text: The Assassin gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|f:372208cc0f434c17abfb5140e8806ebc}haemorrhage{/g}. The bonus is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.
